data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Scott Hogan scores to make it 1-0 at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Maxime Colin.
In the minute 58, Mads Andersen is booked for the away team.
Birmingham's Riley McGree has been booked in Birmingham.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Barnsley.
In the minute 71, Cauley Woodrow levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Jonathan Leko for Birmingham has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
Luke Thomas is on a sub for Conor Chaplin for Barnsley.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Victor Adeboyejo with Dominik Frieser. This is the second substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
The away team replace Herbie Kane with Matty James.
Barnsley make their fourth substitution with Romal Palmer replacing Alex Mowatt.
In the minute 81, Ivan Sunjic is replacing Riley McGree for the home team.
Jeremie Bela is replacing Kristian Pedersen for Birmingham at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's third substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with George Friend replacing Jake Clarke-Salter.
In the minute 84, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Callum Styles.
Great play from Cauley Woodrow to set up the goal.
Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a fourth substitution, with Jon Toral replacing Jonathan Leko.
In the minute 86, Lukas Jutkiewicz is replacing Scott Hogan for Birmingham at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Aapo Halme is on a sub for Cauley Woodrow for Barnsley.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
